Translations.Text: geuui jason-eulo hayeogeum saengjon ke hayeossnola
hananim-eun hue eul sedaedeul-eul wihae geuege chugbog-eul namgyeo
husedae gaunde noa-ege pyeong an-i issdolog hayeossnola
icheoleom hananim-eun seon-eul haengha neun jadeul-ege bosanghanani
hananim-ui chungsilhan han jong-ieoss nola
geuligo hananim-eun bulsinhan na meojileul igsake hayeossnola
sillo geuleul ttaleuneun mulijung-e abeulaham-i iss-eossnola
geuga gyeong-geonha ma-eum-eulo ju kkelo wass-eul ttae
abeojiwa geuui baegseong-ege yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-i mueos-inyo
yeoleobun-i sungbaehaneun geugeos-eun hananim-i anin heowiui usang-i a nideonyo
man-yuui junim-e gwanhayeo yeoleo bun-eun eotteohge saenglahaneunyo
geuleon hu geuneun byeoldeul-eul chyeoda bogoseo
malhagil sillo nae ma-eum-i apeudoda
geuleoja salamdeul-i deung-eul dolli go tteonassdeola
geuhu geuga geudeul-ui sin-ege da gaga neohuineun neohui ap-e malyeondoen eum sig-eul meogji moshaneunyo
mal-eul haji anhneunde eotteon il-i iss-eossneunyo
geuleon hu geuneun dagaga oleun son-eulo geugeos-eul busuwo beolyeossdeola
geuhu usang sungbaejadeul-i geubhi seodulleo dallyeowa geuleul daehani
geuga malhagil yeoleobun-i mandeun usang-eul sungbaehandan mal-inyo
hananimkkeseo yeoleobun-eul changjohasyeossgo yeoleobun-i mandeun geosdo geuleoha dago hani
geudeul-i malhagil hwadeog-eul mandeul-eotaoleuneun bulsog-eulo geuleul deonjila
igeos-i silpaehani geudeul-eun da leun eummoleul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geu deul-eul gajang bicheonhan jadeullo mandeul-eoss nola
geuga malhagil naui junimkkelo galini geubunkkeseo naleul indohayeo jusil geos-ila
juyeo jeoege sunjonghal jason-euljuobsoseo
geulihayeo hananim-eun innaeha myeo sunjonghal aiga iss-eul bog-eum-ui so sig-eul geuege jueossnola

adeul-ui naiga geuwa hamkke ilhal naie ileuleoss-eul ttae geuga malhagil nae adeul-a neoleul jedan-e eul lilaneun myeonglyeong-eul naega kkum-eseo boass nola neoui saeng-gag-i eotteonji algo sip guna lago hani adeul-i malhagil a beoji dangsinkkeseo myeonglyeongbad-eun daelo ha obsoseo hananimkkeseo innaehaneun jong-eu lobuteo wonhasindamyeon dangsinkkeseo jeoleul balgyeonhal geos-ibnida hayeossdeola
